mapper.update: update restaurant set address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phoneNumber = #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lng_lat = #{lngLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shopName = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where restaurant_id = #{restaurantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select restaurant_id, address, `type`, phoneNumber, lng_lat, image, shopName, `password` from restaurant
